sentences.en: Across the table, his son Benjie munched appreciatively.
sentences.cn: 桌子对面，他儿子本吉津津有味地大声咀嚼着。

sentences.en: Cows munch mostly grasses and hay - yet they grow big and hefty.
sentences.cn: 牛吃的是草,但却长得身高体壮.

sentences.en: Getting them to munch on vegetable dishes was more difficult.
sentences.cn: 使他们吃素菜就比较困难了.

sentences.en: He peeled two more and continued to munch.
Here, I munch on the trees answer to no one.
sentences.cn: 这里, 老子在树上啃苹果,不需要搭理任何人.

sentences.en: In the rush of morning, munch them along with low - fat string cheese.
sentences.cn: 在匆忙的早上, 可以吃几口葡萄,加上一些低脂肪的麻花状奶酪.

sentences.en: In the series, all the student wizards and even the teachers munch the disgusting fare.
sentences.cn: 在这个系列里, 所有的巫师学生甚至老师们都在大嚼这个恶心的食物.
卢克大声嚼着鸡肉三明治。

sentences.en: Many people like to munch on apples because they can help with weight loss.
sentences.cn: 很多人喜欢咯嚓咯嚓地嚼苹果是因为苹果能助人减重.

sentences.en: Most students already likely to be in the terrified pose Munch depicted.
sentences.cn: 大部分学生可能已经对蒙克的描述构成了惊恐.

sentences.en: Puffins in the coffin munch muffins.
sentences.cn: 棺木里的海鹦大嚼松饼.

sentences.en: Stop smoking and munch right to help your body stay at a healthy weight.
sentences.cn: 戒烟和慢慢咀嚼可以帮助你保持健康体重.

sentences.en: The animal threatens to munch through thousands of Viking vessels and other historic shipwrecks, scientists warn.
sentences.cn: 科学家警告,这种动物正在吞噬掉数以千计的海盗沉船和其它历史时期的沉船.

sentences.en: We watched her munch through two packets of peanuts.
sentences.cn: 我们看她津津有味地嚼了两包花生米.

sentences.en: Workers gathered to munch, gossip, kibitz, laugh.
sentences.cn: 员工们聚拢来,大嚼, 闲话, 抢话,大笑.

trans.tran_cn: 用力咀嚼， 出声咀嚼
trans.tran_en: If you munch food, you eat it by chewing it slowly, thoroughly, and rather noisily

trans.tran_cn: 用力咀嚼（某物），大声咀嚼
